lines.text: There are people who in this world get shoved around and there are people who do the shoving!
Who wants to be a skinny pencil? I'm happy being a magic marker!
There's going to be trouuubbbllleee!
Make that douuubbbblllleeee!
Y-you mean H-harrison asked you out on a d-d-d-d...
DATE, Blair; we call it a DATE!
Yeah, to some wing-ding Friday night.
Could that be YOUR wing-ding, Blair?
[after Blair goes crashing through the bedroom wall]
Excuse me, Mrs. Garrett, did Blair come crashing through here?

[Mrs. Garrett is giving the girls their mail]
And the rest is for Natalie.
*All* of those?
Natalie... have you been writing to prisoners again?

[to Blair]
You're so spoiled that if you were milk the date on the carton would be B.C.!

[Trying to remember all of her family members across the nation]
Well, there's the Manhattan Warners, there's the South Beach Warners, there's the Palm Beach Warners...

[Interrupting]
What about the ones in Hollywood?
Who?
The Warner Brothers.
Turn Blue!
I just had another one of my brilliant ideas!
There's going to be trouble...
I don't go to wing-dings, I go to cotillions!
Well if that is a dance at the Hillcrest Country Club, then your cotillion and my wing-ding are the same thing.
Do you know what Jo's real name is? Joanna Marie!
Only my mother calls me Joanna Marie.
[Tootie is a teen model and is ready for her photo shoot]
Am I a fox or what?
Whoever said it was lonely at the top was looking from the bottom.
There's gonna be trouble!
Make that double.
